reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and warm
reviews.reviewText: It has great detail and is heavier than I thought it was going to be although the sweater does run a little bigger than I thought. I ordered a medium, which is usually small on me, but next time I’ll order a small for a little bit more formfitting.

reviews.reviewerName: Bought this boot for the price, it's look and style very uncomfortable. No cushions
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice sweater
reviews.reviewText: This was a very nice inexpensive purchase that has a lot of style with a almost perfect fit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the style of the sweater and the light blue color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This sweater kept me warm and was a very nice fit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and made with quality in mind.
reviews.reviewText: I got this pullover because I don't own anything like it. I was delighted with the quality and craftsmanship of this pullover. The stitching is clean and top-notch. I suspect this will last me for many years. I haven't washed it yet, but I think the color and fabric will hold up nicely. I probably would have tried a size smaller but, it might have been too small. Overall, I am happy and can easily recommend this pullover for anyone looking for one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish warm sweater
reviews.reviewText: I love this sweater on my husband. It fits his athletic frame so nicely. He mentioned it has a nice stretch, it's warm, and feels comfortable on his skin. I haven't noticed much pilling with this sweater but we have removed lint balls with a lint brush. This sweater looks well made and my husband has gotten many compliments while wearing it. It is very stylish and is eyecatching. It would also be great for work or casually. We are going to get more in other colors. We recommend this sweater.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Heavy and warm, but nothing particularly special
reviews.reviewText: Objectively, this is a nice enough sweater. Body types vary, and the appearance of this sweater will vary also depending on the person wearing it. Maybe I'm not much of a sweater guy, but this sweater felt big and bulky on me, and quite heavy, and a lot of what makes it different in appearance than other sweaters seemed secondary to the bulkiness when I looked at myself in the mirror. I'm a shorter guy, at 5'6", and also on the smaller end of large, so maybe that played a role in making this sweater look so bulky.This sweater will definitely keep you warm in the dead of winter or in colder climates. The neck is actually comfy, hugging like a turtleneck, and will add to the warmth it holds in. I can't see any way of wearing this in weather that isn't freezing, unless you are quite prone to getting cold easily.I can't find any fault with this sweater, and it might deserve at least 3 and 1/2 stars, but I can't add that half-star. I also can't find any way this sweater stands out above any other sweater, so I'm not rating it higher.
